sourcing.instructions: - Aluminum Oxide: Chemical supply stores or online chemical distributors
steps: - Aluminum Oxide: Chemical supply stores or online chemical distributors
1. Weigh out 200 g of Aluminum Oxide carefully using a precision scale.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Weigh out 200 g of Aluminum Oxide carefully using a precision scale.

steps: 1. Transfer the mixture into a heat-resistant mold with dimensions of 3 inches x 2 inches x 7 inches.
heating.raw_text: 1. Transfer the mixture into a heat-resistant mold with dimensions of 3 inches x 2 inches x 7 inches.

steps: 1. After heating, turn off the oven and allow the mold to cool gradually to room temperature (approximately 1 hour).
cooling.raw_text: 1. After heating, turn off the oven and allow the mold to cool gradually to room temperature (approximately 1 hour).

steps: 1. Once cooled, carefully remove the solid sample from the mold.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Once cooled, carefully remove the solid sample from the mold.
